item.description:
Concord - at the arena.
We will be there with literature and prepared to discuss the issues with gun show patrons, club members, shooters, law enforcement, military and curious visitors.

We will need to meet and brief for these events, but that doesn't mean we
won't be our usual smiling selves. We'll just have extra (point of focus) 'intellectual ammo' for this trip.

Concord Gun Show

Show hours are...
Saturday 9 to 5
Sunday 9 to 2

ADMISSION $7.00
CHILDREN UNDER 12 FREE WITH ADULT
item.name: Concord Gun Show
